Paragraph: This study investigated the expression of nuclear factor - kappaB ( NF - kappaB ) , mitogen - activated protein ( MAP ) kinases and macrophages in the renal cortex and structural and functional renal changes of rats treated with gentamicin or gentamicin + pyrrolidine dithiocarbamate ( PDTC ) , an NF - kappaB inhibitor .

Note: NF-kappaB is a protein, but it is often referred to as a transcription factor or nuclear factor, which can be considered a complex that includes both proteins and DNA. In this context, it is mentioned in relation to a chemical inhibitor (PDTC), so it is included as a chemical entity. Similarly, MAP kinases are a family of proteins that are activated in response to various stimuli and are considered a type of protein kinase, which can also be considered a chemical entity.
